member.name: M:Ice.Lib.IFileTransfer.DownloadFile(Epicor.ServiceModel.Utilities.SpecialFolder,System.String)
member.summary: Download a file from the server.
member.param: The root of the path.
Source. Where the file is stored on the server. Eg. "dir\file.txt".
member.returns: File content is returned as a byte array

member.name: M:Ice.Lib.IFileTransfer.DownloadFile(Epicor.ServiceModel.Utilities.SpecialFolder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Download a file from the server and save it to a given path.
member.param: The root of the path.
Source. Where the file is stored on the server. Eg. "dir\file.txt".
Destination. Where file is to be copied to on the client. Full name eg, "C:\Temp\file.txt".

member.name: M:Ice.Lib.IFileTransfer.DownloadFile(Epicor.ServiceModel.Utilities.SpecialFolder,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Download a file from the server and save it to a given path.
member.param: The root of the path.
Source. Where the file is stored on the server. Eg. "dir\file.txt".
Destination. Where file is to be copied to on the client. Full name eg, "C:\Temp\file.txt".
A company ID that will be used to determine the tenant's path where the file resides.

member.name: M:Ice.Lib.IFileTransfer.DownloadFileForUser(Epicor.ServiceModel.Utilities.SpecialFolder,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Download a file from the server and save it to a given path.
member.param: The root of the path.
Source. Where the file is stored on the server. Eg. "dir\file.txt".
Destination. Where file is to be copied to on the client. Full name eg, "C:\Temp\file.txt".
A user ID that will be used to determine the user's path where the file resides.

member.name: M:Ice.Lib.IFileTransfer.DownloadString(Epicor.ServiceModel.Utilities.SpecialFolder,System.String)
member.summary: Download a file from the server
member.param: The root of the path.
Source. Where the file is stored on the server. Eg. "dir\file.txt".
member.returns: File content is returned as a string

member.summary: Download a file from the server
member.param: The root of the path.

member.param: The root of the path.
Source. Where the file is stored on the server. Eg. "dir\file.txt".

member.param: The root of the path.
